description: Additive lore collectibles for Atomic Fizz Caps. All entries are tied to real POIs from locations.json.

collectibles.title: RANGER DISTRESS CALL // LAST STAND
collectibles.content:
This is Ranger Holt at checkpoint Bravo.
If anyone hears this, the things in the cavern aren’t animals.
They move like a firing squad.

collectibles.title: INTERNAL MEMO // FIZZ VAULT PILOT
collectibles.content:
Team,
Focus groups LOVE the idea of 'emergency refreshment shelters.'
Do not use the word 'bunker' in public materials.
Legal says it sounds 'too honest.'

collectibles.title: SPARKPLUG'S JOURNAL // ENTRY 3
collectibles.content:
Day 34 since the Strip went quiet.
Slot machines don’t argue when you take their guts.
People do.
Junk never lies to you.

collectibles.title: FORGEMASTER NOTE // THE PITT
collectibles.content:
The furnaces burn hotter every day.
Someone keeps sending us blueprints with no signatures.
Feels like a trap.
But the metal sings.

collectibles.title: FIELD LOG // CHERNOBYL PRIPYAT
collectibles.content:
Radiation here behaves like weather.
It shifts, swirls, and gathers.
Sometimes it feels like it’s watching.

collectibles.title: FIELD LOG // FUKUSHIMA DAIICHI
collectibles.content:
The reactor groans at night.
Not metal fatigue.
Something deeper.
Something alive.

collectibles.title: TRINITY SITE // GLASS SHARD NOTE
collectibles.content:
The sand fused into glass the day the world changed.
Some shards hum when held.
No one knows why.

collectibles.title: RESEARCH NOTE // THE GLOW
collectibles.content:
The glow pulses in cycles.
Not random.
Not natural.
Something beneath the surface is breathing.

collectibles.title: RESEARCH NOTE // GECKO REACTOR
collectibles.content:
Prototype energy signatures detected.
Similar to Helios One, but older.
More primal.
More dangerous.

collectibles.title: NEW RENO // DEALER'S LEDGER
collectibles.content:
House always wins.
Unless you cheat.
Then House sends someone to make sure you don’t win again.

collectibles.title: DUNWICH BUILDING // TOME FRAGMENT
collectibles.content:
The walls whisper.
The floors breathe.
The shadows remember.

collectibles.title: MARIPOSA BASE // PATCH NOTE
collectibles.content:
Orders unclear.
Experiments classified.
Personnel missing.
Recommend evacuation.
Request denied.

collectibles.title: YUCCA MOUNTAIN // PROTOTYPE LOG
collectibles.content:
Prototype X-01 frame unstable.
Energy feedback loop detected.
Recommend shutdown.
Override received: CONTINUE.

collectibles.title: NEVADA TEST SITE // REPORT 22
collectibles.content:
Tesla Cannon prototype successful.
Collateral damage unacceptable.
Recommend containment.
Request ignored.
